version_description:
- Some UI modifications have been done to improve your listening experience, and this application is now also fully compliant with iOS9.
- Bug fixes

Our goal is to keep improving your user experience thanks to the feedback you’ll send us either via our application or by sending us an email at support@radioline.co or by tweeting us @Radioline_App.

Radioline is also available on:
The Web: http://www.radioline.co/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/RadiolineApp
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Radioline_App
Bug fixes
Bug fixes & optimizations

• Progressive download for a better listening experience on podcasts
• Stream is now relaunching automaticaly after a network change and error in player
• Proper pagination with infinite scroll on long lists to find your radio station more easily
• Segmented push notifications according to your interests
Bug fixes.

Carousel optimizations for podcast
App indexing & Dynamic links optimizations
Bug fixes

• Update layout to iOS 11 support
• Radioline lockscreen widget is now dynamically updated and controls fully usable
• Premium users, you can now switch OFF listening continuity again in settings
• Carousel banners doesn't look blurred anymore on big devices
• Tap on "change birthdate" on profile doesn't make the app crash anymore
• Bugs fixes & optimizations
Bug fixes & optimizations
Bug fix

Bug fixes & optimizations
No more overheating of the iPhone
Better battery consumption & faster app launching time
Top podcasts are now randomly displayed on home screen
Date & hour of a chapter's podcast are now always displayed
Radioline in foreground now allows screen to turn off (screensaver)

Bug fixes & optimizations
No more overheating of the iPhone
Better battery consumption & faster app launching time
More different podcasts on the home screen
Date & hour of a chapter's podcast are now always displayed
Radioline in foreground now allows screen to turn off (screensaver)
Solve the overheating of the iPhone and the excessive battery consumption issue!
Brand newsfeeds content available as audio short clips about news, business, sports etc.!

Next/previous between chapters & content list is back
Fix a bug after native alarm ring
Automatic zapping between podcasts' chapters is back
Bugs fixes & optimizations
Introducing auto renewable subscription (for premium)

Brand new app with a new Radioline Premium subscription containing:
• A service free of advertising*
• Download your podcasts and listen to them offline
• Discover 100+ musical radio stations in High Quality (MP3 - 320 Kbps): jazz, metal, classical...
• Resume listening automatically when opening the app
• Add your favorite songs to your playlists (50 tracks max in one tap)
only $3.49 per month or $32.99 per year

Discover the power of SIRI Shortcuts!
New feature and new price for Radioline Premium: the audio recording at only $1.99 per month using the code "SummerWithRadioline" or $18.99 per year using the code "SummerYearRadioline"!
A few bugfixes and improvements.
A few bugfixes and improvements.
Upgrade application libriaries, chromecast is no longer supported

Radioline is always improving and remains current with the upgrade application to the latest iOS 14.
So relax and enjoy the best radio experience. Be sure to check our latest updates.
Today’s improvements: bug fixes, better app stability and GDPR policy reviewed.
#AudioAtHeart
